tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_therapy_group_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  therapy_date DATE,
  therapy_time TIME,
  attendance_status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    session_time TIME,
    therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
    therapy_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    attendance_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES TherapySessions(session_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientSessions (
  patient_id INT,
  session_id INT,
  attendance_status VARCHAR(10),
  participation_score INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, session_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id int PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  age int,
  gender varchar(10),
  medical_condition text
)

CREATE TABLE music_therapists (
  therapist_id int PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  specialization varchar(100),
  experience_years int
)

CREATE TABLE sessions (
  session_id int PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date date NOT NULL,
  therapy_type varchar(50),
  therapist_id int REFERENCES music_therapists(therapist_id)
)

CREATE TABLE attendance (
  attendance_id int PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id int REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  session_id int REFERENCES sessions(session_id),
  participation_rating int,
  notes text
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id int PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id int REFERENCES sessions(session_id),
  therapist_id int REFERENCES music_therapists(therapist_id),
  feedback_text text,
  rating int
)
